Document.Title: WPF: “WPF Databinding: How do I access the ‘parent’ data context?”; StackOverflow.com; RelativeSource FindAncestor

Content:
Binding="{Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource FindAncestor,
AncestorType={x:Type Window}}, Path=DataContext.AllowItemCommand}"
